author: pawandhananjay
content: Hey! We are currently using the net_version endpoint to query for the network id. It's not really required imo so I have made a pr that removes the requirement here https://github.com/sigp/lighthouse/pull/3214

author: jgm
content:
Interesting, looks like lighthouse is voting for the incumbent in this period and so disagreeing with the majority.
```
SELECT f_eth1_deposit_count AS deposits, convert_from(TRIM('\x00'::BYTEA FROM f_graffiti)::BYTEA, 'UTF8') AS graffiti, COUNT(*) AS blocks FROM t_blocks WHERE f_slot >= 36864 AND f_slot < 38912 AND f_eth1_block_hash = '\x5262362cf8318c1179062b876416588d214aa617a4df99f9906bf2d320476e92' GROUP BY deposits, graffiti ORDER BY deposits, blocks desc, graffiti;
 deposits |             graffiti             | blocks 
----------+----------------------------------+--------
      566 |                                  |      6
      566 | Kiln                             |      1
      570 |                                  |     84
      570 | "prysm-k8s"                      |     77
      570 | teku/v22.5.2+56-g94be24e         |     77

      570 | Besu üêê Lodestar                  |     23
      570 | Besu üêê Lighthouse                |     22
      570 | Lodestar-v0.37.0/dapplion/eth1-d |     21

      570 | lighthouse-nethermind            |      9

      570 | lighthouse-geth                  |      7
      570 | prysm-besu                       |      7
      570 | Lodestar-v0.37.0/c8d5c56         |      6
      570 | lodestar-geth                    |      6
      570 | ropsten-validator                |      4
      570 | teku-besu                        |      4

      570 | lodestar-besu                    |      3

      570 | teku-nethermind                  |      2
```
